name: Border Patrol Police Simulator
description:
Start working as a Border Police Officer and stop the smuggling of illegal goods in border patrol police simulator. Experience the life of a real border officer, search for contraband like drugs, money and illegal goods. Search vehicles entering the country and check documents to grant them entry in border patrol police game. Working at the country border is really challenging as you have to constantly look for anything suspicious and stop the smuggling of contraband like drugs, liquor, narcotics. The border guard of a country is a national security agency that performs border security. In border force simulator enforce the security of the country's national border and stop the smuggling of contraband.

Game Features:
Play as a border police officer and stop the smuggling of contraband
Search for smuggled alcohol, drugs, weapons
Check driver's license, transport checklist
Smooth and easy to play cop games controls

Enjoy the amazing gameplay and give us your feedback to help improve the game in future releases.
